activities: Events.com provides software as a service (SaaS) to event organizers to help facilitate on-line registration, payment and organization of events ranging from athletic endurance events to festivals.   Users would log-into Events.com, choose the event they desired to enroll into, and enter the appropriate information required to register for the desired event.  Events.com may receive the following personal information; user's first and last name, email address, mailing address, phone number(s), alternative user-name, password.  User may opt to log in with their third party social media platform, such as Facebook, in which cast additional user information such as friend lists and other social data may be collected.  All the information is collected to aid the Event Organizer in selling registrations and better understand the customer/event goer for internal marketing purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All Client and Customer data is covered under our organizations self-certification.  No data is manually processed data.
privacyprograms: A self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
recoursemech: Counsel of Better Business Bureaus, Inc. EU Safe Harbor Privacy Dispute Resolution Program
